document.full_text: the miami heat piled the pressure on bruised and battered boston by taking a 2-0 lead in their nba playoff series with a 102-91 victory on tuesday.
document.title: miami put heat on celtics, thunder level series
lines_and_colors: the miami heat piled the pressure on bruised and battered boston by taking a 2-0 lead in their nba playoff series with a 102-91 victory on tuesday.
